description: Safety, accessibility and sustainability panel agendas and reports from 2006 to 2016

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["The Safety, Accessibility and Sustainability panel was superseded by the Safety, Sustainability and Human Resources panel in 2016."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}

It considered wide-ranging issues including policy, strategy, the implementation of the Mayor's Transport Strategy and operating business performance in relation to safety, accessibility and sustainability considerations for TfL's services.
This panel was renamed from 1 April 2014. It was previously named the Safety and Sustainability panel from 1 April 2012.

Members: Charles Belcher (Chair), Patrick O'Keeffe (Vice Chair), Richard Barnes, Baroness Grey-Thompson, Michael Liebreich, Bob Oddy

On 2 February 2012 the TfL Board approved changes to its committee and panel structure.  From 1 April 2012 the Safety, health and environment assurance committee ceased to exist, with its items of business being split between the Audit and assurance committee and the new Safety and sustainability panel.
